## AuthInterceptorConfig class

Configuration object that is used by AuthInterceptor, overriding its properties allows you to customize configuration

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class AuthInterceptorConfig 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isAuthenticated()](./authentication.authinterceptorconfig.isauthenticated.md) |  | Gets indication whether is user authenticated or not |
|  [isAuthPage()](./authentication.authinterceptorconfig.isauthpage.md) |  | Gets indication whether request was done from authentication page |
|  [showAccessDenied()](./authentication.authinterceptorconfig.showaccessdenied.md) |  | Redirects current page to access denied page |
|  [showAuthPage()](./authentication.authinterceptorconfig.showauthpage.md) |  | Redirects current page to authentication page |
